tag-1: Citibank Bahrain Launches Biggest-Ever Cash-Back Campaign
tag-2: Manama, Bahrain – Citibank Bahrain announced the launch of "Biggest Ever Cash Back" campaign for their credit card members. This is a unique and innovative balance transfer promotion which assists customers to pay off their other card balances and book them with a Citibank Credit Card at a much lower interest rate.
tag-3: This first of its kind offer will allow customers to not only realize savings with low interest rate but incrementally enjoy cash back of up to 20 percent over installments of up to 36 months. As part of the campaign, customers would be rewarded with up to 20 percent cash back on transferring their other credit card balances to a Citibank Credit Card.
tag-4: Navneet Kampani, Citibank Consumer Bank Head, said, "Innovation with client excellence is the core to our business strategy and to that effect we are pleased to offer our customers a great balance consolidation platform. Our debt advisors can help the clients assess their current commitments and advise on conducts to re-align their debts to realize savings with the same monthly outflow."
tag-5: Sonik Kapur, Director of Marketing and Cards Business Head, commented: "Citibank is at the forefront of offering unique value proposition to our card members. We offer a diversified product pallet in Bahrain and are pleased to introduce this new balance transfer campaign to help our card members realize savings and get rewarded at the same time."
tag-6: Customers can apply by sending SMS 'BTF' to 39179401, or calling 1758 2484 (CITI) or visiting www.citibank.com/bahrain.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
